author: cnbc.com
title: Assist America Appoints Ernesto T. Estillore as Chief Financial Officer
text:
PRINCETON, N.J., Feb. 28, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Assist America, Inc., provider of global emergency assistance services, announced today the promotion of Ernesto T. Estillore to Chief Financial Officer. Ernesto joined Assist America in November of 2015 as Director of Finance and quickly became an integral part of the executive management team across all of Assist America's markets.
"Since joining the company, Ernesto has been instrumental in directing the implementation of our strategic business plans and developing financial and tax strategies across all of our domestic and international operations," said Brian Mulligan, Assist America's CEO.
In his new role, Ernesto will be responsible for ensuring that Assist America is run the most efficient and effective way possible. "As CFO, I will continue to work with everyone to identify areas where we can improve and give our company a competitive edge in the marketplace," explained Ernesto.
"I believe in our organization, its people and the services we provide. I believe that we make an impact in the lives of the people we serve. I'm a witness to the dedicated and hardworking employees who work in our organization," added Ernesto.
About Assist America, Inc.:
Founded in 1990, Assist America provides global emergency medical services through employee and student benefit plans. Headquartered in Princeton, NJ, the company serves more than 40 million members worldwide and over 300,000 enterprises through programs from the world's most prominent insurance companies. For more information, please visit www.assistamerica.com . Follow Assist America on Facebook , Twitter , and LinkedIn .
